about_the_game:
Abyssal Vanquisher Supporter Pack


The abyss obscures many dangerous secrets - threats beyond comprehension. It is the sworn duty of the Abyssal Vanquisher to defeat the unknowable.

This Pack Includes:

Scourge of the Depths

Terror and Fear will be the only things seen on the faces of your enemies while you wear the Scourge of the Depths cosmetic armor set.

Deep Dweller's Cape

You are being watched, and you should be very afraid of the eye that peers at you from the Deep Dwellers Cape cosmetic back attachment.

Call of the Deep

Summon a portal from the depths with the Call of the Deep portal cosmetic.

Abyssal Vanquisher In-Game Title

Your allies and foes will know fear as you display the Abyssal Vanquisher in-game cosmetic title.

Abyssal Vanquisher Forum Badge

You were here for 1.1, and your journey is a part of your story. Showcase your travels with the Abyssal Vanquisher Forum Badge.

100 Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.


*Please note that DLC Packages are not refundable, and if you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Please check before purchasing to ensure you have not already purchased this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
